item.title: Business Phone Goes Hosted
item.description:
The evolution of business phone systems has progressed from basic single-line setups to intricate PBX systems accommodating numerous phones. However, the latest advancement isn’t about bigger in-house systems but rather a shift towards hosted solutions. Hosted business phone, also known as cloud-based phone service, involves a provider managing your phone system on their equipment.
